challenges.description: Increased climate-related disasters make navigation more dangerous for individuals with visual impairments.
Floods and wildfires disrupt accessibility and make evacuation nearly impossible for people with mobility challenges.
Emergency alerts and warnings about climate events are often inaccessible to those who are deaf or hard of hearing.
People with albinism often have sensitive skin and may struggle with overheating, as their bodies may not efficiently regulate heat due to the lack of pigmentation.
